#!/bin/bash -xe
sudo su 
yum update -y
yum install docker -y 
service docker start 
docker pull httpd 
docker volume create vol 
docker run -d --name hut -p 80:80 -v vol:/usr/local/apache2 httpd
cd /var/lib/docker/volumes/vol/_data/htdocs 
yum install git -y 
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/sushmitabhandari/iDirect.git 
git clone https://github.com/sushmitabhandari/iDirect.git 
mv iDirect/iDirect.html .
truncate -s 0 index.html 
mv iDirect.html index.html
